Name: Cacao (PH)
Description: These pods are full of little beans that, when refinned in a Processor, become cocoa powder.

DescriptionLocalization.es: These pods are full of little beans that, when refinned in a Processor, become cocoa powder.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: These pods are full of little beans that, when refinned in a Processor, become cocoa powder.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Diese Schoten sind voller kleiner Bohnen. In einem Zerkleinerer können sie zu Kakaopulver verarbeitet werden.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: These pods are full of little beans that, when refinned in a Processor, become cocoa powder.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: These pods are full of little beans that, when refinned in a Processor, become cocoa powder.
DescriptionLocalization.it: These pods are full of little beans that, when refinned in a Processor, become cocoa powder.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: These pods are full of little beans that, when refinned in a Processor, become cocoa powder.
DescriptionLocalization.pt: These pods are full of little beans that, when refinned in a Processor, become cocoa powder.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: В этих стручках полно маленьких какао-бобов, которые при измельчении на небольшой мельнице превращаются в какао-порошок.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: These pods are full of little beans that, when refinned in a Processor, become cocoa powder.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 这些豆荚里装满了小可可豆，在小磨坊里精炼后就变成了可可粉。
